0.title: Expertise
0.text: ASRR has a diverse team of talented professionals. Combining these areas we have a wide coverage of expertise for anything IT related. We have specialists in websites, apps, desktop applications, hardware, BI, data anlytics, and much more!

1.title: Efficiency
1.text: Using our microservice approach to coding, we don't have to reinvent the wheel for every project. We have a custom built collection of over-engineered components that can be combined to create a robust foundation for your project. We can then focus our efforts on the areas that are unique so that we can ensure the best product possible.

2.title: Elastic
2.text: From the beginning, ASRR has always adapted to the needs and restrictions laid out by our clients. As we have a very robust base, we can easily adapt to any given situation, while still keeping our applications very reliable.

landing.title: Innovative Software Development
landing.text: Responsible for creating innovative and fast cutting edge software quickly and efficiently

form.name: FORM Architecture & Engineering B.V.

esp.story: Het is een erg jong, professioneel en dynamisch bedrijf met een flat management structuur, dit zorgt voor een vlotte communicatie zowel intern als met de klanten, waardoor er veel aandacht en zorg is voor de klant. Ik heb erg goede ervaringen opgedaan met ASRR. Een echte aanrader als je op zoek bent naar een professionele partner die met je meedenkt en waar de klant op nummer 1 staat!

title.text: The services we provide can be categorized under the following three groups
Let's get in touch and see what ASRR has to offer
Interested in what ASRR can do for you?

teams.title: Scaleable IT-teams
teams.text: With current technology, an IT project usually takes the hard work and expertise of multiple developers. Not every company afford this, and even if they can it's hard to create an efficient team. This is where ASRR delivers full-stack scalable IT teams that can seamlessly integrate with your current process.

preview.title: Scaleable IT-teams
preview.text: With current technology, an IT project usually takes the hard work and expertise of multiple developers. Not every company afford this, and even if they can it's hard to create an efficient team. This is where ASRR delivers full-stack scalable IT teams that can seamlessly integrate with your current process.

full-stack.text: We create progressive web applications that give your end-user the best experience possible, using native features and offline caching combined with seamless integration with our back-end systems. Click read more for a full list of advantages!

data-analytics.text: Analysing data correctly can save any company from excess costs and inefficiency. Using our BI analytics on one of your existing or a new database, ASRR will provide insights into key aspects of your data.

consultancy.title: IT Consultancy
consultancy.text: Not sure what you need? ASRR can send an expert to analyse your company processes and propose a solution and fitting advice. ASRR can then provide the required developing skills.

preview.title: IT Consultancy
preview.text: ASRR delivers tailored advice from an expert in the subject for anything IT related, be it websites, applications, servers, AI/machine learning and much more. We can lead projects from the ground up, or adapt existing ones to fit your current needs. These solutions can then be carried out perfectly by our development team.
preview.landingText: Tailored advice from an expert in the field

preview.title: Custom Built Hardware
preview.text: If cloud is not what you need, we can also provide you with custom built servers, with far superior power to cost ratios. They can be used as strong workstations, remote desktop environments or even to host your API's on a kubernetes cluster.
preview.landingText: Servers that fit your needs exactly

servers.title: Servers | Hardware
servers.text: Slow and old systems can cause serious hinder in both security and efficiency. That's why we build our servers from scratch, selecting the right parts for the job at hand. Using this we can create remote desktop environments, data storage servers and machines optimized for heavy rendering.

title.text: Customer satisfaction is our number one priority at ASRR

case.text_1: HES and ASRR came into contact due to a connection with their head planner. The planner had noticed how all of the current logistics information about the locations of the steel parts, needed for construction of big oil tanks, was tracked in a single excel file, spanning over 30 thousand lines. Needless to say, this was both a security issue and an efficiency bottleneck. This is where we provided a solution.
case.text_2: Create an intuitive, cross-platform application to manage the vast amount of logistics data needed for a 500-million-dollar project. Create valuable insights for management to track the overall progress.
bullets: A Custom excel parser that allowed us to read the data into an enterprise grade SQL database
A Spring Boot (Java) back-end system to lay down business rules for every action connected to a piece
A ReactJS Web Application to be used on mobile by the workers, and on desktop by managers to check the input
A PowerBI dashboard to give insight to management about the overall process
case.preview_link: Click here to visit the demo site

introduction.title: The Problem
introduction.text: HES and ASRR came into contact due to a connection with their head planner. The planner had noticed how all of the current logistics information about the locations of the steel parts, needed for construction of big oil tanks, was tracked in a single excel file, spanning over 30 thousand lines. Needless to say, this was both a security issue and an efficiency bottleneck. This is where we provided a solution.

bullets.value: A Custom excel parser that allowed us to read the data into an enterprise grade SQL database
Automate the configuration of houses using code, automatically upload exports to the cloud and open up requests for new houses to third parties.

• Complex interface with the existing program
  • Spring Boot Rest API hosted in kubernetes
  • Front-end Web App in ReactJS
  • A custom server
  • Cloud storage

result.title: What We Did
result.text:
FORM uses complex BIM models to combine smart parametric designs with a structured way of working to create the 
3D models needed to build a house. This is a perfect example of something that can be automated.
The program FORM uses to engineer and model houses is called Autodesk Revit. Revit can be a bit unreliable at times,
 which posed a threat to ensuring we can go from a manual process to a fully automated cloud version.
We wrote a program that plugs into the existing application, enabling us to imitate user interactions with code. 
This allows us to automate complex actions flawlessly. 
Using the program, we create an output within Revit, for example a PDF with the building plans.
 This pdf is then uploaded to the cloud, and its location is passed to the central server.

conclusion.title: Conclusion
conclusion.text:
In short, we were able to adapt to the current process by writing code that integrates with the used programs. 
We then pushed it all to the next level by using enterprise grade methods to ensure reliability,
 speed and a good overall user experience. 
To put this into numbers, this can save hundreds of euros per house, making FORMâs Automation a cutting-edge competitor 
to big time firms while delivering consistent and reliable outputs.

landing.title: Reinventing the housing industry
landing.text:
A robust and new way of creating a safe online web portal
for companies and just text to put here.

introduction.title: The Problem
introduction.text:
One of our oldest clients, FORM, has hired ASRR and its developers for years to provide for their IT needs. 
Together with FORM we think about how we can realize the vision they
 have had for nearly a decade on how to revolutionize the housing industry

bullets.key:
The old process
(in a generic BIM/Architecture firm)
bullets.value: An architect manually changes chosen options for a new house for every house in a block, then generates every export separately and has to manage the huge amount of files involved.
Automate the configuration of houses using code, automatically upload exports to the cloud and open up requests for new houses to third parties.

• Complex interface with the existing program
  • Spring Boot Rest API hosted in kubernetes
  • Front-end Web App in ReactJS
  • A custom server
  • Cloud storage

result.title: What We Did
result.text:
FORM uses complex BIM models to combine smart parametric designs with a structured way of working to create the 
3D models needed to build a house. This is a perfect example of something that can be automated.
The program FORM uses to engineer and model houses is called Autodesk Revit. Revit can be a bit unreliable at times,
 which posed a threat to ensuring we can go from a manual process to a fully automated cloud version.
We wrote a program that plugs into the existing application, enabling us to imitate user interactions with code. 
This allows us to automate complex actions flawlessly. 
Using the program, we create an output within Revit, for example a PDF with the building plans.
 This pdf is then uploaded to the cloud, and its location is passed to the central server.

In short, we were able to adapt to the current process by writing code that integrates with the used programs.
